meta.job_title: Advanced Airborne Sensor Algorithm Engineering Lead and Section Leader

skills.skill: Real-Time Signal and Image Algorithm Development

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, implement, test, and verify real-time signal and image processing algorithms for Airborne Radar platforms.
Provide technical team leadership in requirements development, mathematical algorithm development, analysis, documentation, and integration and test.
Lead/support business proposals and ROMs for the programs supported.
Oversee section member job assignments, performance and recognition, including salary planning.
Support the professional development of team members and participate in mentoring activities for junior engineers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering, Electrical, Physics, Aerospace, Mathematics, or related STEM discipline with 10+ years of relevant experience – OR Advanced Degree in Engineering, Physics, Technology, Mathematics, or related STEM discipline with 8+ years of relevant experience.
